title: Metroidvania Action/Adventure Music Pack
longDescription:
Link to the demos!


A collection of 10 symphonic metal tracks written for Metroidvania or Action oriented games. The music will bring to life the different in-game locations, giving them a unique feel while maintaining a general cohesion.

The music was written for electric guitar, electric bass, drums and orchestra including strings section, brass section and a percussion section.


This pack includes 10 tracks, each with a loop edit for convenience: 

All tracks are .wav, 44.1kHz, 16 bits


  • Battle Of The Ages (2:16)
  • Battle Of The Ages - Loop (2:08)
  • Destiny's Battle (2:10)
  • Destiny's Battle - Loop (2:05)
  • Glory Awaits (2:07)
  • Glory Awaits - Loop (1:54)
  • Grand Adventure (2:21)
  • Grand Adventure - Loop (2:13)
  • Halls of Tragedy (2:21)
  • Halls of Tragedy - Loop (2:08)
  • Land Of Gold (2:21)
  • Land Of Gold - Loop (2:14)
  • Library of Souls (2:09)
  • Library of Souls - Loop (2:01)
  • Road To Victory (2:16)
  • Road To Victory - Loop (2:08)
  • The Hero's Path (2:28)
  • The Hero's Path - Loop (2:19)
  • War Attitude (2:07)
  • War Attitude - Loop (2:00)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 high quality symphonic metal tracks
  •  10 loop ready edits

Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1kHz / 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 43:52 (including loop edits)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
